sample.name: ASP.NET Core Web App
sample.description: An example of my first web app developed using ASP.NET Core. ASP.NET Core is a cross-platform, high-performance, open-source framework for building modern, cloud-based, Internet-connected applications.

sample.name: Flexbox Page Layout Examples
sample.description: The Flexbox Layout (Flexible Box) module (currently a W3C Last Call Working Draft) aims at providing a more efficient way to lay out, align and distribute space among items in a container, even when their size is unknown and/or dynamic (thus the word "flex").

sample.name: CSS Styling with Sass Examples
sample.description: Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

sample.name: Web Apps that implement Lodash
sample.description: A modern JavaScript utility library delivering modularity, performance and extras.
